summary: Do you ever just think of HP and realise how fucking much you love the books and the fandom and the whole fucking wizarding...
body:
Do you ever just think of HP and realise how fucking much you love the books and the fandom and the whole fucking wizarding world and JKR for bringing such a story to life and you feel like crying and laughing and screaming and then crying again?

Bc I do.

reblog.comment:
Do you ever just think of HP and realise how fucking much you love the books and the fandom and the whole fucking wizarding world and JKR for bringing such a story to life and you feel like crying and laughing and screaming and then crying again?

Bc I do.

trail.content_raw:
Do you ever just think of HP and realise how fucking much you love the books and the fandom and the whole fucking wizarding world and JKR for bringing such a story to life and you feel like crying and laughing and screaming and then crying again?

Bc I do.
trail.content:
Do you ever just think of HP and realise how fucking much you love the books and the fandom and the whole fucking wizarding world and JKR for bringing such a story to life and you feel like crying and laughing and screaming and then crying again?

Bc I do.

summary: squib theory
title: squib theory
body: I feel like cats are really popular among squibs. I mean, the two squibs we actually know things about (Filch and Mrs. Figg) both own cats, and we also know that they have this really strong connection to their cats (they probably got their cats from a magical pet store). I like to think that squibs get cats as a way of still being a part of the magical community, and honestly that makes me love cats even more than I already do.

tags: like way slower than i wanted to
summary: Lioness’ Pride pt 3 preview
title: Lioness’ Pride pt 3 preview
body:
heya all sorry this is taking so long, real life got me down and, well, poetry comes to me a lot more easily than fic ever has.

Here’s a little sneak peek at the first bit of part 3 that is coming sometime soon I promise!
(Argent is my OC, borrowed from some of Nemo’s AUs)

*******

It’s odd when Argent comes to visit.  He doesn’t seem to notice Harry’s famous scar and he’s always sneaking an extra biscuit onto Harry’s plate - sleight of hand because he moonlights as a “magician”, and Minerva tolerates it with a fondness that still surprises Harry.  Professor Argent, or Solomon as he insists on, is amazing at Charms as well as a master of Mind-Magic and so he teaches Harry how to guard his mind, and when it lessens the nightmares but doesn’t stop them it is Solomon who casts a detection charm and finds the Horcrux hiding in Harry’s scar.

summary: The story of how Azkaban came to be is so funny to me, honestly yeah it's 3am yeah I should be asleep, but I want to tell you...
body:
The story of how Azkaban came to be is so funny to me, honestly yeah it’s 3am yeah I should be asleep, but I want to tell you guys about it first.

A long time ago there was this mad wizard guy who went to this island, and used all these charms to make it invisible to both wizard and mugglekind. He essentially pulled a Kamino in Episode 2, except instead of clones it was Dementors. Anyway, he did mad wizard things there, built a fortress, tortured people in secret, and then when he finally died his charms failed and the Ministry of Magic was like “Hey. Look at this map? What the hell is that in the North Sea??” So they go to the island to investigate and find the place infested with Dementors, except they don’t know what the fuck Dementors are at this point and they’re like “What the fuck WHAT THE FUCK” and get so spooked that instead of destroying the fortress and the Dementors, they turn the place into a prison and give all the Dementors jobs. They graduated right from conquering to capitalism without even a blink. Impressive. MOM IS FUCKIN STUPID.

COMISSIONS OPEN
Who am I? I am a young artist and writer hoping to share her work with the community. Expect to see works from various fandoms, as well as original creations. I'm also a proud member of the LGBT community, so don't expect to find any hate here.

Follow for more, and don't be afraid to message me. I'm always willing to make new friends.

summary: THE LITTLE SURPRISE
body:
THE LITTLE SURPRISE

- Pairing: You x Anyone you want.

Summary:       You plan a little surprise for your husband and fear that it wouldnt be appreciated. 

A/N: Its sort of an continuation of my previous fic, but its not that related. Feedback will be highly appreciated. But i wouldnt be able to do asks as I use tumblr on the mobile app.

________________________________________________________________

                    “Good morning” you felt his arms wrap around your waist, forehead resting on your shoulders and warm breath brushing your back. “Good morning you lazy ass” you said laughing and flipping the omelet on the pan. He groaned at the name and then playfully swatted your hips which were swaying along the tunes of some upbeat music you didn’t know the name of.

                      “You may want to go and sit on the dining table and stop disturbing me, unless you want burnt breakfast” you said turning around and hitting him lightly on the shoulder with the spatula. “Oh! Spare the burnt food, I may even eat poison if it meant I got to see your annoyed face and swaying hips together on the same morning.” He said cheekily, chuckling as you gave him the finger.

                      It was a comparatively normal morning, given the lives you and your husband led. It was domestic and mellow and perfect. Exactly how you wanted the day to be in order for the future events to unfold properly. You served the breakfast and tried to enjoy the silence and calm while it lasted because you knew that the day was going to turn upside down soon enough.

                        But your jittery nerves didn’t even let you eat. But you were not so sure. There may be other reasons why you may experience a loss of appetite given the current circumstances. He got up, picking up his empty plate and looked funnily at you. You were never the one to eat slowly or pick at your food. You just smiled sheepishly at him and tried to eat whatever was on your plate. He probably brushed it off and started to head towards the washroom to shower and get ready for the day. He was heading exactly where you had put a little surprise gift for him.

                             You started feeling overly nervous and unsure about the ‘surprise’. Maybe you should’ve waited a bit more. You were trying to think of ways you could use to prevent him from discovering the secret surprise, when you heard a loud and shaky, shocked “What the fuck!” coming from the washroom. You let out a shaky gasp. He had found out. You started walking towards the washroom, getting ready and preparing yourself for a confrontation you were stupidly scared about.

                             “Y/N, there is a lizard in the shower! Make it go away. It’s going to kill me.” A lizard? That’s not what he was supposed to fin……You realized that he hadn’t seen your surprise yet and you didn’t know whether to sigh in relief or to smack your husband upside down on his head. Such a big grown up man and given the life and everything it consists of plus the big responsibility that’s going to arrive on his head, he still wants you to get the lizard away. As if that little reptile is going to have his head off. You still went in there, all nervousness thrown out of the window when you saw him crouching behind the toilet seat, pointing towards a little lizard that was busy minding its own business.

                                You huffed and went ahead to caressingly get the little reptile on your palm. You turned around to show him that the lizard meant no harm, only see a sight that made all air leave your lungs. Y/H was standing there holding the little surprise in his hand checking it out carefully and you saw his eyes widen as he realized what he was holding. A soft, almost silent “Oh god” left his lips, his face contorted in an expression you didn’t recognize what it was. He lifted his head, eyes watery “Is it true?”

                                  A little nod was all that was needed to make him come to you and engulf you into his warm embrace. The positive pregnancy test forgotten on the sink counter. You felt tears running down your eyes as an elated laughter bubbled out of his throat.

                                “We’re going to be parents!!?!!!?!?!” he asked, rather exclaimed. It made you burrow your head further into his neck, a soft whisper of yes escaping your mouth, all fear and jittery nerves vanished.

                                “Is it inside you? The baby? Of course it is. What even am I asking? But when did you know? Do you have a bump? I don’t feel a bump.” You laughed at his excitement. Any other time you would’ve rolled your eyes or scoffed at him, but this time around you knew how exciting it was and hence you answered his queries. “Well it’s not a baby yet. More of a blastocyst or an embryo.  And I took the test about 3 days ago so I’ve known since then. And I don’t think I will be sporting a bump until after 3 months…… so you’ll have to wait for it to happen.”

                                   “What if it’s not one but two babies? What if its twins or triplets or quadruplets or quintuplets?” “Let’s not scare me now.” You said the thought of quintuplets causing you to shudder.

                                     “Okay”, he said “but I call dibs on naming the baby.” “Ugggghhhhhh okay! But we are not going to call our baby Elevendork and that’s final.” A tender smile settled on your lips as you heard him chuckle. “Here goes my plan.”

                                       A sudden grave look came upon his face, borderline scared and you assumed that he was beginning to doubt being a father. You were going to get into full explanation mode but he spoke up first. “Y/N, honey where is the lizard?” Your eyes widened as you realized where the lizard must have gone. A Cheshire cat grin spread on your face as you leaned up to his ears and whispered, “I guess its having its time of the life on your back honey.”

                                     You rushed out of the washroom, laughing as a loud terrified screech filled the entire house. You were the most happy you’ve been in a while and that’s what mattered.

                                        It amazed you, the amount of happiness and liveliness the news of the existence of the little blip had brought on and you couldn’t wait for it to come in your lives. But all you could do is imagine how wonderful of a family you would be after the entry of your little baby.

———————————————————————————————————–

TAGS:

@wehaveabucky @samingtonwilson @softlybarnes @irndad @dragoncreek319 @jurassicbarnes @thewnchstrs @whyisbuckyso @babylevines @papi-chulo-bucky @captainrogerss @violentlybarnes @carryonmywaywardcaptain @sumafamouxx @221bshrlocked @buckynasty @petalstofish @viktorkrumn @radstiel @dont-you-dare-say-misha @jay-the-red @winchesterwolf30 @sophieasaurus @4narniand4aslan @lupihn-s  @shawnmendesimagines0 @supernaturalimagine @castiel-winchester-of-the-lord @luciousmalefoy

trail.content_raw:
THE LITTLE SURPRISE

- Pairing: You x Anyone you want.

Summary:       You plan a little surprise for your husband and fear that it wouldnt be appreciated. 

A/N: Its sort of an continuation of my previous fic, but its not that related. Feedback will be highly appreciated. But i wouldnt be able to do asks as I use tumblr on the mobile app.

________________________________________________________________

                    “Good morning” you felt his arms wrap around your waist, forehead resting on your shoulders and warm breath brushing your back. “Good morning you lazy ass” you said laughing and flipping the omelet on the pan. He groaned at the name and then playfully swatted your hips which were swaying along the tunes of some upbeat music you didn’t know the name of.

                      “You may want to go and sit on the dining table and stop disturbing me, unless you want burnt breakfast” you said turning around and hitting him lightly on the shoulder with the spatula. “Oh! Spare the burnt food, I may even eat poison if it meant I got to see your annoyed face and swaying hips together on the same morning.” He said cheekily, chuckling as you gave him the finger.

                      It was a comparatively normal morning, given the lives you and your husband led. It was domestic and mellow and perfect. Exactly how you wanted the day to be in order for the future events to unfold properly. You served the breakfast and tried to enjoy the silence and calm while it lasted because you knew that the day was going to turn upside down soon enough.

                        But your jittery nerves didn’t even let you eat. But you were not so sure. There may be other reasons why you may experience a loss of appetite given the current circumstances. He got up, picking up his empty plate and looked funnily at you. You were never the one to eat slowly or pick at your food. You just smiled sheepishly at him and tried to eat whatever was on your plate. He probably brushed it off and started to head towards the washroom to shower and get ready for the day. He was heading exactly where you had put a little surprise gift for him.

                             You started feeling overly nervous and unsure about the ‘surprise’. Maybe you should’ve waited a bit more. You were trying to think of ways you could use to prevent him from discovering the secret surprise, when you heard a loud and shaky, shocked “What the fuck!” coming from the washroom. You let out a shaky gasp. He had found out. You started walking towards the washroom, getting ready and preparing yourself for a confrontation you were stupidly scared about.

                             “Y/N, there is a lizard in the shower! Make it go away. It’s going to kill me.” A lizard? That’s not what he was supposed to fin……You realized that he hadn’t seen your surprise yet and you didn’t know whether to sigh in relief or to smack your husband upside down on his head. Such a big grown up man and given the life and everything it consists of plus the big responsibility that’s going to arrive on his head, he still wants you to get the lizard away. As if that little reptile is going to have his head off. You still went in there, all nervousness thrown out of the window when you saw him crouching behind the toilet seat, pointing towards a little lizard that was busy minding its own business.

                                You huffed and went ahead to caressingly get the little reptile on your palm. You turned around to show him that the lizard meant no harm, only see a sight that made all air leave your lungs. Y/H was standing there holding the little surprise in his hand checking it out carefully and you saw his eyes widen as he realized what he was holding. A soft, almost silent “Oh god” left his lips, his face contorted in an expression you didn’t recognize what it was. He lifted his head, eyes watery “Is it true?”

                                  A little nod was all that was needed to make him come to you and engulf you into his warm embrace. The positive pregnancy test forgotten on the sink counter. You felt tears running down your eyes as an elated laughter bubbled out of his throat.

                                “We’re going to be parents!!?!!!?!?!” he asked, rather exclaimed. It made you burrow your head further into his neck, a soft whisper of yes escaping your mouth, all fear and jittery nerves vanished.

                                “Is it inside you? The baby? Of course it is. What even am I asking? But when did you know? Do you have a bump? I don’t feel a bump.” You laughed at his excitement. Any other time you would’ve rolled your eyes or scoffed at him, but this time around you knew how exciting it was and hence you answered his queries. “Well it’s not a baby yet. More of a blastocyst or an embryo.  And I took the test about 3 days ago so I’ve known since then. And I don’t think I will be sporting a bump until after 3 months…… so you’ll have to wait for it to happen.”

                                   “What if it’s not one but two babies? What if its twins or triplets or quadruplets or quintuplets?” “Let’s not scare me now.” You said the thought of quintuplets causing you to shudder.

                                     “Okay”, he said “but I call dibs on naming the baby.” “Ugggghhhhhh okay! But we are not going to call our baby Elevendork and that’s final.” A tender smile settled on your lips as you heard him chuckle. “Here goes my plan.”

                                       A sudden grave look came upon his face, borderline scared and you assumed that he was beginning to doubt being a father. You were going to get into full explanation mode but he spoke up first. “Y/N, honey where is the lizard?” Your eyes widened as you realized where the lizard must have gone. A Cheshire cat grin spread on your face as you leaned up to his ears and whispered, “I guess its having its time of the life on your back honey.”

                                     You rushed out of the washroom, laughing as a loud terrified screech filled the entire house. You were the most happy you’ve been in a while and that’s what mattered.

                                        It amazed you, the amount of happiness and liveliness the news of the existence of the little blip had brought on and you couldn’t wait for it to come in your lives. But all you could do is imagine how wonderful of a family you would be after the entry of your little baby.

———————————————————————————————————–

TAGS:

@wehaveabucky @samingtonwilson @softlybarnes @irndad @dragoncreek319 @jurassicbarnes @thewnchstrs @whyisbuckyso @babylevines @papi-chulo-bucky @captainrogerss @violentlybarnes @carryonmywaywardcaptain @sumafamouxx @221bshrlocked @buckynasty @petalstofish @viktorkrumn @radstiel @dont-you-dare-say-misha @jay-the-red @winchesterwolf30 @sophieasaurus @4narniand4aslan @lupihn-s  @shawnmendesimagines0 @supernaturalimagine @castiel-winchester-of-the-lord @luciousmalefoy

summary: I am an immense, absolutely ginormous sucker for Sirius' tattoos in the movies. Fantastic, perfection, love em to bits. Makes me...
body: I am an immense, absolutely ginormous sucker for Sirius’ tattoos in the movies. Fantastic, perfection, love em to bits. Makes me raise a brow when it’s said they’re prison tattoos, but then I think about how if I was a wandless, innocent wizard thrown into Azkaban without a trial and desperate to keep myself sane while having Dementors for landlords I’d carve protection runes into my flesh jailhouse style, too.

reblog.comment: I am an immense, absolutely ginormous sucker for Sirius’ tattoos in the movies. Fantastic, perfection, love em to bits. blog.name: moffittarts
blog.title: Eat Pant
blog.description: I'm an amateur cartoonist and the illustrator for the comic Cy:Bear Punk Comics. I'm an 18 year old teen who loves to draw, watch (and obsess over) movies, loves pipe and theater organs and enjoys stand-up comedy. Also I'm very hyperfixated on 'Animal Crossing: New Leaf,’ ’The Nightmare Before Christmas,' 'The Rocky Horror Picture Show,' and my own characters. The Mayor of Halloween Town, Mr. Resetti and Dr. Shrunk are my top favorite characters, but I absolutely adore my own characters and stories. Talk and send me asks, I love it when that happens. (Boy I sure do love my characters, Animal Crossing, The Nightmare Before Christmas, The Rocky Horror Picture Show, Steam Powered Giraffe, The Love Bug movie series, Captain Underpants, Harry Potter, Inside Out and much more that I can't remember at the moment.) I tag all of my art with “Moffitt.”
